001Q1.question: The first question I feel like I should ask for the sake of this text adventure is do you have autism? (Y or N)

001Q2.question: Now that we have gotten to know you a bit more let's get to making a friend shall we. You are in class alone, you look over to see a somewhat cool looking dude named Jack, what do you do?

002Q2.question: You should probably go talk to him

001Q3.question: Jack responds with a friendly hello (tip you should ask Jack his interests) what do you do?

001Q4.question: Jack tells you about his love for Ori the owl house and heluva boss what do you do?

D.text: I am not interested in any of these

001Q5.question: Jack would like to test you on ori to see if you're a true fan. Your first question is who is the villain of Ori and the will of the wisps? (note if you get any question wrong you will be sent back to the question that you got wrong)

001Q6.question: In ori and the will of wisps the ability that allows you to reach some serious height by launching off enemies is?

001Q7.question: In ori and the will of the wisps which character causes ori to find the wisps

001Q8.question: Jack is happy your a fellow Ori fan

004Q5.question: Jack would like to test you on your The Owl House knowledge to see if you're a real fan Your first question is Which of the following is a god? (note if you get any question wrong you will be sent back to the question that you got wrong)

004Q6.question: In The Owl House which Villain is redeemed in the end of The Owl House ?

004Q7.question: In The Owl House What form did the villain take in the final fight?

004Q8.question: Jack is happy your a fellow The owl house fan

005Q5.question: Jack would like to test you on your Helluva boss knowledge to see if your a real fan. Your first question is Who is so far the main villain (of season 2 episode 4) (note if you get any question wrong you will be sent back to the question that you got wrong)

005Q6.question: In heluva boss Which character has the highest shown kill count?

005Q7.question: Which ring of hell dose helluva boss mainly take place in?

005Q8.question: Jack is happy your a fellow Helluva boos fan

003Q4.question: You tell Jack your interested in pokemon so you to decide to do a pokemon battle your level 5 Rowlet against his level 5 eevee what do you do

003Q5.question: It's a critical hit ending the battle. Jack thinks the battle was fun and is now ready to be friended what do you do?

001QEnd.question: Good Job you have made friends with Jack (press enter to restart)

101Q2.question: Now that we have gotten to know you a bit more let's get to making a friend shall we. your in class alone when you spot a cool but socially awkward dude named liam what do you do?

102Q2.question: You should probably go talk to him

101Q3.question: Liam doesn't respond but from a further glimpse of him you can see he has a dnd book and a lego star wars keychain attached to his bag what do you do?

A.text: Ask him if he wants to play dnd later

B.text: Tell him you like star wars

101Q4.question: To test if your a true star wars fan liam wishes to test you on starwars (tip if you get an answer wrong you will end up immediately back at the question you got wrong) your fist question is What is darth vader's real name

101Q5.question: Your second question is who is the leader of the reabel aliance?

101Q6.question: your third question is The dark side of the force is a pathway to abilities many consider to be...

B.text: The tragedy of Darth Plagueis the Wise

101Q8.question: Your final question is what is order 66

A.text: It turned all of the clones into Storm_Troopers

B.text: Makes the clones kill their jedi generals

101Q9.question: Liam respects your impressive knowledge of star wars and wishes for you to be his friend

101QEnd.question: Good Job you have made friends with Liam (press enter to restart)

103Q4.question: later you are playing dnd with liam as he says (you come across the beholder what do you do?)

103Q5.question: You roll a net 20 and slay the beholder liam thinks that was fun and wishes to be your friend what do you do?
